text:
Hi,

I'm keep getting this message, when some   exception stopped application.  (eg.
OutOfMemory error)

java.lang.NullPointerException
        at
org.apache.catalina.loader.WebappClassLoader.findResourceInternal(WebappClassLoader.java:1795)

It seems, that this classloader has been stopped, but the webapp itself not. 
It should raise a meaningful message instead, not a NPE.
creator: smil@dev.hu

text:
Once you get an OutOfMemoryError, the VM is in a badly defined state.  The NPE
is probably not the problem itself, just the first random error that occurs
after the OOME.

If you can reproduce the NPE reliably without an OOME, please reopen the issue
and let us know how you do it so that we can do it ourselves.  Otherwise, solve
the OOME first.
creator: yoavs@computer.org
